name: Blood Truck
description:
--------- About the game ---------

This game was created in less than 48hours by a team of 3 students from the EESI (European school of Visual Arts) Blood Truck is a serious game. It's all about the conditions (sometimes silly) needed to give blood.

" As a nurse, you have to choose who can or cannot give his blood. The only information you have is the way people look like, their names and their jobs. Careful, it's not as easy as it seems"

-------- Controls --------

Click on the door to welcome a new patient. Choose if they can or cannot give their blood.

--------- Install Instructions ---------

Open the zip folder and click on the index file. The game will be played in your browser. If a message appears just click on "OK"
